meanings.sent1: She glanced at the clock before rushing out the door.
meanings.sent2: He glanced over the newspaper during breakfast.
meanings.sent3: The cat glanced at the mouse, pretending not to be interested.
meanings.sent4: The sun glanced off the water, creating a beautiful reflection.
meanings.sent5: The teacher glanced around the room to make sure everyone was paying attention.

meanings.sent1: I caught a quick glance of the sunset before it disappeared behind the mountains.
meanings.sent2: She gave a brief glance at the menu before deciding what to order.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel stole a glance at the bird feeder before darting away.
meanings.sent4: His glance towards the exit hinted at his desire to leave the party early.
meanings.sent5: The child's glance at the candy store window was filled with longing.
